summary.span: 的实现，充当指示的程序集和代码编译单元内类型的容器。

span.span: An implementation of that acts as a container of types within the indicated assemblies and code compile units.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 除了处理已编译的程序集（ 和 方法）外，此 实现还可以处理尚未编译的类型 ()。This implementation, in addition to handling compiled assemblies ( and methods), can handle types that have not been compiled yet (). 将为使用 引用的类型返回 的受限实现。The limited implementation of is returned for types referenced using . > [!NOTE] > 从引用程序集中仅返回公共类型，而从本地程序集中同时返回公共类型和非公共类型。 only returns public types from referenced assemblies, and both public and non-public types from local assemblies.
